body_html: I think you can write a function that reads your own environment variables to populate and return a tf.ConfigProto() that sets these options -- I don't think it belongs in the TF core. The explicit proto makes reproduction much easier.
body_text: I think you can write a function that reads your own environment variables to populate and return a tf.ConfigProto() that sets these options -- I don't think it belongs in the TF core.  The explicit proto makes reproduction much easier.
body: I think you can write a function that reads your own environment variables to populate and return a tf.ConfigProto() that sets these options -- I don't think it belongs in the TF core.  The explicit proto makes reproduction much easier.
